verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H376>them:<s%> 'When either man or <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6381>make<s%> a special <S%H5087>vow,<s%> the <S%H5087>vow<s%> of a <S%H5139>Nazirite,<s%> to <S%H5144>separate<s%> himself to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

he shall <S%H5144>separate<s%> himself from <S%H3196>wine<s%> and strong <S%H7941>drink.<s%> He shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of fermented <S%H7941>drink,<s%> neither shall he <S%H8354>drink<s%> any <S%H4952>juice<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> nor <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3892>fresh<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> or <S%H3002>dried.<s%>

All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> nothing that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H1612>the<s%> <S%H3196>grapevine,<s%> from the <S%H2785>seeds<s%> even to the <S%H2085>skins.<s%>

<S%H3117><s%>"'All the days of his <S%H5088>vow<s%> of <S%H5145>separation<s%> no <S%H8593>razor<s%> shall <S%H5674>come<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> until the <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> in which he <S%H5144>separates<s%> himself to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He shall be <S%H6918>holy.<s%> He shall let the <S%H6545>locks<s%> of the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> grow <S%H1431>long.<s%>
<S%H3117><s%>"'All the days that he <S%H5144>separates<s%> himself to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> he shall not <S%H935>go<s%> near a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body.<s%>

He shall not make himself <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for his <S%H1>father,<s%> or for his <S%H517>mother,<s%> for his <S%H251>brother,<s%> or for his <S%H269>sister,<s%> when they <S%H4194>die;<s%> because his <S%H5145>separation<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> is on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4191><s%>"'If any man <S%H4191>dies<s%> <S%H6621>very<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> beside <S%H7218>him,<s%> and he defiles the head of his <S%H5145>separation;<s%> then he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing.<s%> On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall shave <S%H1548>it.<s%>

On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H834>him,<s%> because he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> by reason of the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> and shall make his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6942>holy<s%> that same <S%H3117>day.<s%>

He shall <S%H5144>separate<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a trespass <S%H817>offering;<s%> but the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be <S%H5307>void,<s%> because his <S%H5145>separation<s%> was <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the <S%H5139>Nazirite:<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%>

and he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lamb<s%> <S%H1323>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%>

and a <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and their meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and his burnt <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> also its meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and its drink <S%H5262>offering.<s%>

The <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is under the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1311>boiled<s%> <S%H2220>shoulder<s%> of the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> out of the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafer,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazirite,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H1548>shaved<s%> the head of his <S%H5145>separation;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> This is <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> together with the <S%H2373>breast<s%> that is <S%H8573>waved<s%> and the <S%H7785>thigh<s%> that is <S%H8641>offered.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> that the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> may <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> who <S%H5087>vows,<s%> and of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> besides that which he is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H5381>get.<s%> <S%H6310>According<s%> to his <S%H5088>vow<s%> which he <S%H5088>vows,<s%> so he must <S%H6213>do<s%> after the <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541><s%> 'This is how you shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>' You shall tell <S%H559>them,<s%>
<S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H8104>you,<s%> and keep you.
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> make his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> on <S%H2603>you,<s%> and be gracious to you.
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H7760>you,<s%> and give you <S%H7965>peace.<s%>'
"So they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and I will bless <S%H1288>them.<s%>"
